title: Black Label Society-Catacombs Of The Black Vatican(Deluxe Editio
description:
Black Label Society-Catacombs Of The Black Vatican(Deluxe Edition) mp3 320kbps What we got....Catacombs of the Black Vatican is the ninth studio album by heavy metal band Black Label Society. The album was released on April 8, 2014. It is the first Black Label Society album to feature former Breaking Benjamin drummer Chad Szeliga after fill-in Mike Froedge departed the band. Froedge himself replaced Will Hunt, who in turn replaced longtime drummer Craig Nunenmacher, all in the span of less than two years.
